    void readData()
    {
        std::ifstream file("teachers.data");
        if (!file)
        {
            std::cerr << "Unable to open file teachers.data" << endl;
            return;
        }

        std::string line;
        int scheduleIndex = 0;
        int courseIndex = 0;
        while (std::getline(file, line))
        {
            if (line.find("name :") != std::string::npos)
            {
                this->name = line.substr(7);
            }
            else if (line.find("id :") != std::string::npos)
            {
                this->id = std::stol(line.substr(5));
            }
            else if (line.find("password :") != std::string::npos)
            {
                this->password = line.substr(11);
            }
            else if (line.find("email :") != std::string::npos)
            {
                this->email = line.substr(8);
            }
            else if (line.find("phone :") != std::string::npos)
            {
                this->phone = line.substr(8);
            }
            else if (line.find("address :") != std::string::npos)
            {
                this->address = line.substr(10);
            }
            else if (line.find("courses.ID :") != std::string::npos)
            {
                if (courseIndex < MAX_Courses)
                {
                    this->course[courseIndex]->setId(std::stoi(line.substr(13)));
                    courseIndex++;
                }
            }
            else if (line.find("schedule :") != std::string::npos)
            {
                if (scheduleIndex < 7)
                {
                    this->schedule[scheduleIndex] = line.substr(11);
                    scheduleIndex++;
                }
            }
            else if (line.find("groups :") != std::string::npos)
            {
                std::istringstream iss(line.substr(9));
                for (int i = 0; i < 13; i++)
                {
                    int bit;
                    iss >> bit;
                    this->groups[i] = bit;
                }
            }
            else if (line.find("--END--") != std::string::npos)
            {
                break;
            }
        }

        file.close();
    }
    void saveData()
    {
        std::ofstream file("teachers.data", std::ios::app);
        if (!file)
        {
            std::cerr << "Unable to open file teachers.data" << endl;
            return;
        }

        file << "name : " << this->name << endl;
        file << "id : " << this->id << endl;
        file << "password : " << this->password << endl;
        file << "email : " << this->email << endl;
        file << "phone : " << this->phone << endl;
        file << "address : " << this->address << endl;
        for (int i = 0; i < MAX_Courses; i++)
        {
            if (this->course[i] != nullptr)
            {
                if (course[i]->getName() != "Unknown")
                {
                    file << "courses.ID : " << this->course[i]->getId() << endl;
                }
            }
            else
                file << "courses.ID : " << endl;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++)
        {
            file << "schedule : " << this->schedule[i] << endl;
        }
        file << "groups : ";
        for (int i = 0; i < 13; i++)
        {
            file << this->groups[i] << " ";
        }
        file << endl;
        file << "--END--" << endl;

        file.close();
    }

    void refreshCourses()
    {
        std::ifstream file("courses.txt");
        std::string line;
        while (std::getline(file, line))
        {
            if (line.find("name") != std::string::npos)
            {
                Courses *course = new Courses();
                course->readData();
            }
        }
    }
    void refreshStudents()
    {
        std::ifstream file("students.txt");
        std::string line;
        while (std::getline(file, line))
        {
            if (line.find("name") != std::string::npos)
            {
                Students *student = new Students();
                student->readData();
            }
        }
    }
